100010001.text: Himeko wants to talk to you about something. Don't forget~

111600101.text: Huh? Did you find something to photograph yet?

111600104.text: Aww, Hook still looks so cute in this photo

111600105.text: I remember this club. We even fought a match here!

111600106.text: I'm a lot better at taking pics now, no?

111600107.text: Don't get too cocky. You've still got lots to learn if you want to take great photos!

111600108.text: But I won't be teaching you that, because I don't want you to surpass me hehe

111600113.text: The photos are almost all gathered up. Keep up the great job!

111600110.text: These photos are all really interesting

111600111.text: Of course, I took my time curating them!

111610101.text: Huh? Did you find something to photograph yet?

111610105.text: Aww, Hook still looks so cute in this photo

111610106.text: I remember this club. We even fought a match here!

111610107.text: Hang on â€” why do I have a photo of Sampo in here!

111610108.text: I'm a lot better at taking pics now, no?

111610109.text: Don't get too cocky. You've still got lots to learn if you want to take great photos!

111610110.text: But I won't be teaching you that, because I don't want you to surpass me hehe

111610118.text: The photos are almost all gathered up. Keep up the great job!

111610112.text: These photos are all really interesting

111610113.text: Of course, I took my time curating them!

111610115.text: I took a pic of Sampo
111610115.option: I snapped a pic of Sampo

111610117.text: Then at least make it a good photo!

200010004.text: It's just a few orders of Yucky Fried Rice. It won't explode that easily.

200010011.text: Wait, why would you ask a question like that :(

200010012.text: I'm just curious about what you're doing

200010016.text: {NICKNAME} must've been working really hard, huh?

200010022.text: {NICKNAME} is a qualified member of the Nameless!

200010023.text: If you found any fun Assignments, don't forget to bring me along!

200010025.text: Great! I'll hold you to that!

200010028.text: {NICKNAME}, if you're that free, why don't you come back to the Express?

200010031.text: Great! I'll hold you to that!

200010005.text: Did you lock yourself out of your own room?

200010007.text: If I did, I'd be obliged to start writing the Seven Enigmas of Astral Express.

200010010.text: That's a scary thought. I can't even imagine the Express without Pom-Pom

200020005.text: I took this picture of the coach. What do you think?

200020007.text: Maybe lower the aperture. Best if you can manually control the duration of exposure.

200020009.text: Time for a new camera, I guess.

200020010.text: I had no idea. {NICKNAME}, you know a lot about this!

200020014.text: There is nothing to nitpick with this one
200020014.option: There is nothing to nitpick with this one

200020015.text: What a coincidence. I think so too.

200020016.text: If there's anything to criticize, it'll be...

200020017.text: Not having me in the picture!

200030001.text: I got a new sticker pack

200030005.text: But I think this one looks more like you

200030015.text: Do I look like that to you?

200030006.text: It doesn't look like you at all
200030006.option: It doesn't look like you at all

200030007.text: I think this one looks more like you

121350002.text: Yeah, you totally look like Pom-Pom. Alright, stop kidding around. There's something important

121350005.text: I suddenly remember there was one thing that caught my attention during this trip to the Luofu

121350006.text: That Matrix of Prescience Ultima at the Divination Commission

121350007.text: The master diviner used that thing to interrogate Kafka, and saw right into her memories without Kafka even saying a word

121350008.text: So I was thinking... Could this matrix be used on me?

121350009.text: Why didn't you ask her at the Seat of Divine Foresight?
121350009.option: You didn't mention this at the Seat of Divine Foresight?

121350012.text: The Luofu had just experienced a huge incident. Jing Yuan is injured, and the master diviner needs to manage the whole place

121350013.text: I couldn't bring up this personal matter

121350014.text: So I thought I'd wait till she wasn't so busy, and then we could go to the Divination Commission together to ask her?

121350015.text: No problem. Let's meet at the Divination Commission

121350016.text: I knew it! You're the best!

121350017.text: Do I have to go too? It's not that I don't wanna, but this is your personal affair...
121350017.option: Do I have to go too?

121350018.text: I... I... I'm just embarrassed to ask others for help on my own! See you at the Divination Commission

121350010.text: It's worth asking. We might even be able to find your lost memories

121350011.text: Yes, yes! I wanted to ask at the Seat of Divine Foresight, but after thinking about it, I felt a little uneasy

121360000.text: {NICKNAME}! Come to my room! I found something amazing!

121360002.text: You'll know when you're here. Hurry!

121420111.text: Great job. I'll send you new pics tomorrow!

121420112.text: I'll be waiting for your good news!

121420108.option: Don't think that's the best photo...

121430101.text: Don't forget to show me all the photos you take~

121430104.text: I actually took this pic? Fascinating!

121430105.text: Thanks for helping me get them back, {NICKNAME}

121430107.text: I think photography is really interesting

121430114.text: Please do the rest of the photos as well. Keep snapping those pics tomorrow!

121430110.option: Pay me a little bit more, then

121430113.text: Got it. I won't skimp on the fees

121440106.text: I just got hit by a tram and went flying

121440107.text: Luckily I maxed out my DEF and didn't get hurt

121440111.text: I was just in a fight

121440112.text: There's an enemy that looked just like a tram

121440113.text: That kind of enemy exists? Curious!

121440117.text: Let's take more pics next time, and you can show your pics to me!

121440114.text: I got too into my photography just then
121440114.option: I was too into taking pics

121440116.text: You can keep taking photos with me in future trips

121450101.text: So? Did you find something to photograph yet?

121450104.text: Aww, Hook still looks so cute in this photo

121450105.text: I remember this club. We even fought a match here!

121450106.text: I'm a lot better at taking pics now, no?

121450107.text: Don't get too cocky. You've still got lots to learn if you want to take great photos!

121450108.text: But I won't be teaching you that, because I don't want you to surpass me hehe

121450113.text: The photos are almost all gathered up. Keep up the great job!

121450110.text: These photos are all really interesting

121450111.text: Of course, I took my time curating them!

121460105.text: But... it seems different from when I took it?

121460106.text: Doesn't look any different to me

121460107.text: Well, maybe I'm remembering it wrong

121460108.text: But surely I've never taken a pic of something as weird as two Trotters...

121460111.text: Oh yeah, my collection over here is also almost done

121460112.text: There are just two photos left. I'll leave them to you!

121460109.text: Times have changed, and the people aren't the same...
121460109.option: Times have changed, and the people aren't the same...

121470101.text: Did you take your photos today?

121470107.text: I wish we could have one on the Express

121470112.text: I'm getting more and more curious about exactly what photos I've taken!

121470114.text: Please keep up the good work tomorrow too!

121470108.text: It's just kinda slightly annoying though
121470108.option: It's just kinda slightly annoying though

121470109.text: How can you talk about Wubbaboo like that!

121470111.text: Watch out, it's gonna bug you at night

121480101.text: So? Did you find something to photograph yet?

121480105.text: Aww, Hook still looks so cute in this photo

121480106.text: I remember this club. We even fought a match here!

121480107.text: Hang on â€” why do I have a photo of Sampo in here!

121480108.text: I'm a lot better at taking pics now, no?

121480109.text: Don't get too cocky. You've still got lots to learn if you want to take great photos!

121480110.text: But I won't be teaching you that, because I don't want you to surpass me hehe

121480118.text: The photos are almost all gathered up. Keep up the great job!

121480112.text: These photos are all really interesting

121480113.text: Of course, I took my time curating them!

121480115.text: I took a pic of Sampo
121480115.option: I snapped a pic of Sampo

121480117.text: Then at least make it a good photo!

122140002.text: Whoa! What's that? It's soooo cute

122140003.text: Why does it look a bit like me

122140004.text: Did you dress it this way?

122140005.text: Of course not! Why would you think that

122140008.text: Why don't you bring it back around the Express for a spell? I want to get a few pics of me holding it!

122140006.text: This little one is a lifeform created by Miss Ruan Mei. It's naturally adorable

130050001.text: Awesome! We can send messages even in the dream!

130050007.text: I just got in touch with Himeko and Mr. Yang. They all went to different Dreamscapes

130050008.text: I'm at the Moment of Dusk! I'm planning to check out the auction

130050009.text: It's gonna be a pain to meet up again, so why don't we split up for now

130050011.text: You're at the Golden Hour? I heard the Dreamscape Sales Store there is super famous

130050012.text: Can you plz check it out for me? Pretty plz? If it's really fun, then I'll head over there next!
